verses.roman:
teṅho rati-mati māge kṛṣṇera caraṇe
tāhāra śrī-mukha-vāṇī tāhāte pramāṇe

synonyms: teṅho—he also; rati-mati—affection and attraction; māge—begs; kṛṣṇera caraṇe—unto the lotus feet of Kṛṣṇa; tāhāra—his; śrī-mukha-vāṇī—words from his mouth; tāhāte—in that; pramāṇe—evidence.
translation: He too prays for attachment and devotion to the lotus feet of Lord Kṛṣṇa, as the words from his own mouth give evidence.
